intro: Campyloneurum decurrens, commonly known as the running moss, is a species of liverwort belonging to the family Porellaceae. It is a non-vascular plant that thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in temperate regions. Campyloneurum decurrens plays a role in soil stabilization and provides habitat for various microorganisms and invertebrates.
